dt: {bc}a compact usually solid piece of substantial material especially when worked or altered to serve a particular purpose
{bc}the piece of wood on which the neck of a person condemned to be beheaded is laid for execution
{bc}a mold or form on which articles are shaped or displayed
{bc}a hollow rectangular building unit usually of artificial material
{bc}a lightweight usually cubical and solid wooden or plastic building toy that is usually provided in sets
{bc}the {d_link|casting|casting} that contains the cylinders of an {d_link|internal combustion engine|internal combustion engine}

dt.t: a slow start out of the {wi}blocks{/wi}
putting a {wi}block{/wi} on any future development

dt: {bc}a halting or impeding of the progress or movement of an opponent by use of the body
{bc}interruption of normal physiological function (as of a tissue or organ)
{bc}{d_link|local anesthesia|local anesthesia} (as by injection) produced by interruption of the flow of impulses along a nerve
{bc}interruption or cessation especially of train of thought by competing thoughts or psychological suppression
{bc}a wooden or metal case enclosing one or more {d_link|pulleys|pulley} and having a hook, eye, or strap by which it may be attached
{bc}a piece of material (such as wood or linoleum) having on its surface a hand-cut design from which impressions are to be printed
{bc}a usually rectangular space (as in a city) enclosed by streets and occupied by or intended for buildings
{bc}the distance along one of the sides of such a block

dt.t: The store is two {wi}blocks{/wi} down on the right.
lived a {wi}block{/wi} away from the school

dt: {bc}a large building divided into separate functional units
{bc}a distinctive part of a building or integrated group of buildings
{bc}a platform from which property is sold at auction

dt.t: went on the {wi}block{/wi} and sold for nearly three million dollars

dt: {bc}a quantity, number, or section of things dealt with as a unit
used especially to say that someone is no longer young or has become knowledgeable, capable, or mature because of past experience

dt.t: … it seemed possible that to fall for a woman who had {phrase}been around the block{/phrase} a few times might be to rob himself of much of the purely ornamental elements … of first love.
The business is now {it}on the block{/it}.

et: Middle English {it}blok{/it}, from Middle French & Middle Dutch; Middle French {it}bloc{/it}, from Middle Dutch {it}blok{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}bloh{/it} block
shortdef: a compact usually solid piece of substantial material especially when worked or altered to serve a particular purpose : such as
the piece of wood on which the neck of a person condemned to be beheaded is laid for execution
a mold or form on which articles are shaped or displayed

dt: {bc}to make unsuitable for passage or progress by obstruction

dt.t: The road was {wi}blocked{/wi} by a rock slide.

dt: {bc}to hinder the passage, progress, or accomplishment of by or as if by interposing an obstruction

dt.t: senators trying to {wi}block{/wi} passage of the bill
The building {wi}blocks{/wi} our view of the ocean.

dt: {bc}to interfere usually legitimately with (an opponent, an opponent's shot, etc.) in various games or sports
{bc}to prevent normal functioning or action of
{bc}to restrict the exchange of (currency, checks, etc.)
{bc}to mark or indicate the outline or chief lines of
{bc}to shape on, with, or as if with a block {dx_def}see {dxt|block:1||1b}{/dx_def}
{bc}to secure, support, or provide with a block {dx_def}see {dxt|block:1||1}{/dx_def}
{bc}to work out (the principal positions and movements) for the performers (as of a play)
{bc}to work out the players' positions and movements for (a scene or a play)

dt.t: {wi}block{/wi} out a scene before the actors arrive on set

dt: {bc}to make (two or more lines of writing or type) flush at the left or at both left and right
{bc}to hit (a ball or shot) inaccurately toward the right from a right-handed swing or toward the left from a left-handed swing {bc}{sx|push||}

dt.t: … you get excited, don't finish your backswing and {wi}block{/wi} your next drive into the foliage.

dt: {bc}to interfere usually legitimately with an opponent {bc}to block an opponent

pt: {sc}hinder{/sc} {sc}impede{/sc} {sc}obstruct{/sc} {sc}block{/sc} mean to interfere with the activity or progress of. {sc}hinder{/sc} stresses causing harmful or annoying delay or interference with progress.
{sc}impede{/sc} implies making forward progress difficult by clogging, hampering, or fettering.
{sc}obstruct{/sc} implies interfering with something in motion or in progress by the sometimes intentional placing of obstacles in the way.
{sc}block{/sc} implies complete obstruction to passage or progress.

shortdef: to make unsuitable for passage or progress by obstruction
to hinder the passage, progress, or accomplishment of by or as if by interposing an obstruction

dt: {bc}pulley blocks with associated rope or cable for hoisting or hauling

shortdef: pulley blocks with associated rope or cable for hoisting or hauling

dt: {bc}a {d_link|copolymer|copolymer} that is made up of a series of blocks of simpler polymers

dt.t: The Akron polymer system is essentially an extension of a {wi}block copolymer{/wi} of styrene and dienes (e.g., isoprene, butadiene) developed in the early 1960s …

shortdef: a copolymer that is made up of a series of blocks of simpler polymers

dt: {bc}a diagram (as of a system, process, or program) in which labeled figures (such as rectangles) and interconnecting lines represent the relationship of parts

shortdef: a diagram (as of a system, process, or program) in which labeled figures (such as rectangles) and interconnecting lines represent the relationship of parts

dt: {bc}an unrestricted grant made by the U.S. federal government to state and local governments to be used at their discretion to pay especially for social services that were formerly paid for through specific federal programs

shortdef: an unrestricted grant made by the U.S. federal government to state and local governments to be used at their discretion to pay especially for social services that were formerly paid for through specific federal programs

dt: {bc}an often hand-drawn simple capital letter composed of strokes of uniform thickness

shortdef: an often hand-drawn simple capital letter composed of strokes of uniform thickness

dt: {bc}an outdoor public party put on by the residents of a city block or neighborhood

shortdef: an outdoor public party put on by the residents of a city block or neighborhood
